tool_description: PresentID Voice gender recognition API can recognize the gender of the speaker.
name: Voice Gender Recognition
title: Voice Gender Recognition

api_list.name: Send voice with voice URL
api_list.description:
Voice gender recognition API can recognize the gender of the speaker.

*The voice file size must not exceed 5 MB*
*Also, the voice lenght must be between 3 socunds and  1 minute*
